data.text: Digaula guu kae Tebedebe o di Hagababa gi di hale laa dela ne haga togomaalia go David gi di maa gaa dugu i ono lodo. Digaula gaa hai nadau tigidaumaha e logo mo nia tigidaumaha hagadaubuni ang gi God.
Muli David ne hagalawa ana hai tigidaumaha, mee ga hagahumalia nia daangada i di ingoo o Dimaadua,
gaa duwwe nia meegai gi digaula huogodoo. Mee e wanga ana palaawaa daa dagidahi, di mada goneiga dunu, mono ‘grape’ maangoo gi nia daane mo nia ahina dagidahi ala i lodo Israel.
David guu dongo ana daangada mai i lodo digau Levi belee dagi taumaha a Dimaadua, di God o Israel, e dadaahili mo di haga hagaamu a Mee i mua Tebedebe o di Hagababa.

Asaph guu dongo e dagi, dalia Zechariah e hai dono dangada hagamaamaa. Jeiel, Shemiramoth, Jehiel, Mattithiah, Eliab, Benaiah, Obed Edom mo Jeiel la belee dadaagala i nia ‘harp’. Asaph e hai ana lee gi nia ‘cymbal’,
gei dogolua daangada hai mee dabu go Benaiah mo Jahaziel e iliili nau labaa nia madagoaa huogodoo i mua Tebedebe o di Hagababa.
Deenei tolongo matagidagi a David ne wanga gi Asaph mo ono ehoo gau Levi di waawa e dadaahili gi Dimaadua i nia daahili hagaamu.
Heia nia danggee gi Dimaadua,
Daahili hagaamuina Dimaadua.
Gidaadou gi manawa lamalia
Hula gi Dimaadua, e kae godou hagamaamaa,
Goodou go nia hagadili o Jacob
Dimaadua la go tadau God.
Hudee de langahia di hagababa a Dimaadua,
Di hagababa ne hai go Mee gi Abraham,
Dimaadua guu hai dana hagababa gi Jacob,
Mee ne helekai, “Au ga gowadu gi di goe tenua go Canaan,
Nia daangada a God le e hogoohi,
Digaula nogo heehee i mehanga nia henua,
Gei Dimaadua digi hai digaula gii hai hagahuaidu go tangada,
ga helekai, “Goodou hudee hagahuaidu ina
Digau huogodoo o henuailala gi daahili gi Dimaadua!
Hagadele ina ono madamada gi nia henua,
Dimaadua le e aamua ge e humalia belee hagaamu giibeni.
Nia god o nia guongo huogodoo ala i golo,
Nia madamada mono mahi e haganiga i di gili o Maa.
Digau huogodoo i henuailala gi hagaamuina Dimaadua.
Hagaamuina di ingoo madamada o Dimaadua.
Henuailala hagatau gi polepole i mua o Mee!
Henuailala mo di langi, tenetene!
Di moana mo ono mee huogodoo i no lodo,
Nia laagau i lodo nia henua ga wwolowwolo tenetene
Goodou danggee gi Dimaadua,
Helekai gi Mee, “Meenei Dimaadua
Hagaamu ina Dimaadua, di God o Israel!

Di King David guu dugu Asaph mo ono ehoo gau Levi e madamada humalia taumaha dela ma gaa hai i di gowaa dela e benebene ai Tebedebe o di Hagababa. Digaula e hai nadau hegau aalaa i golo i nia laangi huogodoo.
Obed Edom, tama daane a Jeduthun, mo nia daane e modoono maa walu (68) mai i dono madahaanau la belee hagamaamaa digaula. Hosah mo Obed Edom e madamada humalia i di hagaloohi nia bontai.
Zadok, tangada hai mee dabu, mo ono ehoo gau hai mee dabu, le e madamada humalia nia hai daumaha gi Dimaadua i di gowaa hai daumaha i Gibeon.

Nia luada mo nia hiahi huogodoo, digaula e dudu nadau tigidaumaha hagadogomaalia i hongo di gowaa dudu tigidaumaha, gii hai be nia mee ala guu hihi i lodo Nnaganoho ne wanga go Dimaadua gi digau Israel.
Digau e dau dalia digaula la go Heman mo Jeduthun mo digau ala ne hilihili belee hai nadau daahili e haga hagaamu Dimaadua i dono aloho deeodi.

Heman mo Jeduthun e madamada humalia labelaa nia labaa mo nia ‘cymbal’ mo nia mee hai daahili ala i golo ala e huwa nadau daahili i di madagoaa o nia daahili hagaamu ma gaa huwa. Digau o di madahaanau o Jeduthun le e madamada humalia nia bontai di abaaba.
Nia daangada huogodoo guu hula gi nadau guongo, gei David gaa hana labelaa gi dono hale, e hagamolooloo i baahi dono madahaanau dulii.16.43 2 Samuel 6.19-20
